the cool forest and its noises.
One day, the bear heard a new noise. It was a little girl, singing a pretty song. The bear walked to the girl and said, "Hi, I like your song. It is a nice noise." The girl smiled and said, "Thank you, bear. I like your big, soft fur."

day, a little dog named Max went for a walk. He was very glad because the sun was shining and the birds were singing. Max walked on the side of the road, sniffing the flowers and wagging his tail.
Suddenly, Max saw a big cat. The cat looked angry and Max started to panic. He didn't know what to do. He ran in circles, barking loudly. The cat just watched him, not moving at all.
Then, Max's friend, a little girl named Lily, came running. She saw Max and the cat and knew what to do. Lily picked up Max and hugged him.

three years old and very curious. One day, she was walking in the garden and saw something shiny. She walked closer and saw a smooth mineral.
'What is this?' she asked herself.
Just then, her mom came near her and noticed the mineral. She smiled at her daughter and said, 'Let's open it.'
The little girl began to open the mineral, and out came a small toy. She was so excited she wanted to play with it straight away. However, her mom told her to be careful.

. Tim put on his warm coat and hat. He was ready to go for a walk.
Tim walked in the park. He saw a little dog. The dog was cold too. Tim wanted to help the dog. He took off his hat and put it on the dog. The dog was not cold anymore. The dog wagged its tail and walked with Tim.
They walked together and had fun. Tim and the dog became good friends. Even though the day was cold and dull, Tim and the dog were happy. They walked in the park every day, and they were never cold again.

room, but he could not find it. Tim was sad because he thought he lost his hat. He was also tired from looking for it all morning.
Tim walked outside to ask his friend, Sue, if she saw his hat. Sue was wearing a hat that looked just like Tim's hat. Tim was surprised and said, "That is mine!" Sue laughed and said, "No, this is my hat. I got it yesterday."
Just then, Tim's mom came outside with a big smile. She was holding Tim's hat. She said, "I found your hat, Tim! It was under your bed."

. The dog was all alone and it was trembling. Tim felt sad for the dog. He walked up to the dog and said, "Hi dog, why are you trembling?" The dog replied, "I am cold and scared."
Tim wanted to help the dog. He opened his big, blue bag and took out his tight, warm blanket. He wrapped the dog in the blanket. The dog stopped trembling and wagged its tail happily. Tim and the dog became best friends.
The moral of the story is to always be kind and help others when they need it.

Tim found a tube while playing outside. He picked it up and looked inside. It was empty. Tim was upset because he wanted to find something fun in the tube.
He walked to his friend, Sally, and showed her the tube. Sally said, "Tim, we can put something fun in the tube!" Tim smiled and said, "Thank you, Sally! Let's do it!"
They found some colorful balls and put them in the tube. They shook it and laughed as the balls made funny noises. Tim was not upset anymore. He thanked Sally for helping him have fun with the tube. They played with the tube

was a little dog named Spot. Spot was very tired. He had played all day with his friends. Spot wanted to go home and sleep.
Spot walked to his home. He saw a big door. The door was closed. Spot wanted to gain the power to open the door. He thought, "I am small, but I can do it!"
Spot pushed and pushed the door. He tried very hard. At last, the door opened! Spot was happy. He went inside and slept. He was not tired anymore.

. He would go to the barber and get a new hairstyle. 
Jimmy walked to the barber's shop. The barber was friendly. He said, "What can I do for you today?" 
Jimmy said, "I want to change my look." 
The barber said, "Ok, let's take a look at what we can do." 
The barber trimmed Jimmy's hair and combed it differently. When he was done, Jimmy smiled. He liked his new look and he was no longer cold. 
Jimmy thanked the barber and left. He was happy that he

and don't give up, you can do anything you want.

One day, a boy named Tim went for a walk. He wanted to find love. Tim walked and walked. The sun was warm and the sky was blue. He saw a big tree and sat under it. Tim looked around, but there was no love available.
Then, Tim saw a girl named Sue. Sue was walking too. Tim said, "Hi, Sue! I am looking for love. Can you help me?" Sue said, "Yes, Tim! I can help you. Let's walk together and find love."
They walked

was hiding under a bench, looking gloomy and scared.
Anna felt sorry for the dove. She wanted to help it. She walked slowly and quietly to the bench. She reached out her hand and said, "Don't be afraid, dove. I won't hurt you. I want to be your friend."
The dove looked at Anna with its dark eyes. It did not move or make a sound. Anna gently stroked its feathers and felt its warm body. She smiled and said, "You are so pretty, dove. What is your name?"
The dove did not answer, but it seemed to relax a little.

upon a time, there was a boy named Tim. Tim loved to walk. He walked to the park, to the store, and to his friend's house. One day, Tim saw a big man in a uniform. The man was a police officer. Tim liked the uniform and wanted to be a police officer when he grew up.
The next day, Tim went to school. He saw a girl named Sue. Sue was sad. Tim asked her why she was sad. Sue said her toy was gone. Tim wanted to help Sue. He put on his pretend police uniform and went to find Sue's toy.

shared it with his friends later. Tim was happy that he could enjoy the chocolate with everyone.

One day, a little boy named Tim went to find the sunrise. He walked and walked until he saw a crazy bird. The bird was jumping and dancing. Tim thought it was very funny.
"Hello, bird!" Tim said. "Can you help me find the sunrise?" The bird stopped dancing and looked at Tim. "Yes, I can help you!" the bird said. They walked together, looking for the sunrise.
But then, something unexpected happened. The crazy bird started to grow bigger and bigger! Tim

big picture outside. A little girl named Amy saw him and wanted to join. She walked up to Tom and said, "Can I paint with you?"

a small pond close by and wanted to look at the fish.
He walked to the pond and saw many fish swimming around. Tim was very happy. He called to his mom, "Mom, look at the fish! They are so pretty!" His mom came over and smiled. "Yes, they are very pretty, Tim."
As they watched the fish, a nice man came by with ice cream. Tim's mom bought them each a cold treat to help them cool down from the hot sun. They ate their ice cream, watched the fish, and had a great day at the park.

Once upon a time, there was a soldier. He was very thirsty. He wanted to find something to drink.
The soldier walked and walked until he found an open door. Inside, he saw a big cup. He thought, "This must be for me to drink!" He picked it up and took a big sip. But it was not water!
Suddenly, the soldier started to get small. He was now as small as a bug! The soldier was scared, but he knew he had to find a way to be big again.
